Presentations

Kent TV, Schrider DR, and Matute DR (2024) Demographic history and the efficacy of selection in the globally invasive mosquito Aedes aegypti. Poster at TAGC, Washington DC

Software

ANGSD-wrapper: scripts for analyzing next generation sequencing data using the program ANGSD.
